word: H2748 - חַרְטֹם - charṭôm - khar-tome' - Magician - மந்திரவாதி

sections.paragraph: a diviner, a magician, an astrologer; an engraver, a writer (only in a derivative sense of one who possessed occult knowledge)
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From the same as H2747; a horoscopist (as drawing magical lines or circles): - magician.
Cognate: H2747, H2748
